Sector Arrival.text:
Dark Bramble is a twisted mass of throny vines shrouded in fog. Shards of ice and rock float around its perimeter, remnants of the host planet it outgrew long ago. Now that the sun is growing bigger and hotter, Dark Bramble is returning to life after a long period of dormancy.

Few dare to venture into Dark Bramble's murky depths, and fewer still (specifically none) ever return.

Turn back, you have so much to live for.

explore.text:
You find the barely-recognizable remains of a Nomai escape pod entangled in a web of vines. You also find a cave in a nearby asteroid where the remaining Nomai took shelter after the crash.

The survivors discovered that Dark Bramble is actually a giant interdimensional carnivorous plant, and theorized that if they could get a tracking device inside one of the vines, they might be able to follow it back to the roots of Dark Bramble (where the Vessel crashed).

Crashed Escape Pod.probe description: a light shining through the fog

explore.text:
You find a giant jellyfish frozen in a floating chunk of ice. It doesn't appear electrically-charged, so you move in to investigate.

You examine the specimen and discover a hollow body cavity just big enough to fit a person. Is this what the traveler was talking about?

Frozen Jellyfish.probe description: a jellyfish encased in a huge chunk of ice

explore.text:
You meet a grisled traveler living inside the skeleton of a dead anglerfish (its lure is still glowing...maybe it keeps the other anglerfish away).

Even though he's been stranded here for quite some time, he doesn't seem overly eager to head back to civilization.

In return for not telling anyone his whereabouts, he tells you about a nearby location that holds a secret to reaching the center of Giant's Deep.

Anglerfish Skeleton.probe description: a light shining through the fog
